column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Great place to take people from out of town
column2: to get some of the best pizza in Chicago!  I don't eat pizza that much otherwise
column3: probably because it is one of the most addictive and calorie heavy foods known to the Midwest.  One piece is half the calories for the day
column4: and you can't just have one!   Usually a crowded experience (lots of tourists) but for a good reason.
